original_text: Then Jesus said to his disciples, ‘What I say is true. It is very difficult for rich people to let God rule in their lives.
korean_text: 예수께서 제자들에게 이르시되 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 부자는 천국에 들어가기가 어려우니라

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus said to his disciples
It is very difficult for rich people
to let God rule in their lives.'
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들의 삶을 다스리게 하는 것이.'
